code: import{v4 as uuid}from"uuid";import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from"./types";export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){var timeOut=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:5000;return function(dispatch){var id=uuid();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,payload:id});},timeOut);};};
